122.content:
Zoro had just come down from the crows for a drink of some vigurous training session, Currently the Thousand Sunny had been docked at small island for a while. The town was welcoming to pirates and they needed to restock on food supplies thanks to a certain captain. Zoro took a bottle of sake to drink he was about to head out the door when he saw a single piece of fruit on the table. "where did this come from?" Zoro question, but he shrugged his shoulders and ate it anyway. He left the kitchen, and laid down on the grass for a nap. "Good time for a nap anyway." Zoror soon dozed off, Moments later he woke up completly startled at what he saw. "WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED!!!!" For some reason everything had gotten bigger, he looked around too see anyone had gotten back and was the same way. but no one was on the deck but him. Suddenly heard fott steps coming from the womens quarters.
"Oh look a tiny swordsman." Robin grinned as she neltt down
"This isn't funny, do ou have any idea whats going on?"
"Why yes I do, you see I found this fruit on the other Island that we left a two weeks ago and was wanting to test its abilities."
"Abilities?"
"Yes, you see its called th shrinkie dink fruit, it's not a devil fruit, but a magic fruit thats is supposed to shrink anyone who eats it, and it seems its true."
"You, just used me for you little experiment, OI PUT ME DOWN!!"
Robin picked Zoro up by his harimaki, "Yes and thank you for assisting me in it"

"Now, now calm down and lets measure you to see how tall you are." Robin walked back to the womens cabin and placed the mini swordsman and her desk as she got a ruler. "Now please stand straight against it." Zoro did as he was told and Robin marked the spot with a pencil. " hhmm. four and a half inches."
"het you can revers this can't you."
"Sorry little swordsman, but i did not get the fruit that reverses this, we will have to head back to that ilsand after we leave here." She lied, she infact did have the Big Biggyt fruit, she wanted to have a little fun.
"WHAT YOU MEAN I'M STUCK LIKE THIS TWO WEEKS!!!" this was bad really bad two weeks of traing gone just like that, and he couldn't even use his swords they were way to big for him to even use.
"Calm down it won't be so bad, seeing as it is my fualt I will be happy to make you some close."
"Thanks for that ." There was a knock door as...

1222.content:
Nami walked in with shopping bags, "Robin this place is great, I got so much stuff even these." She heldup three long narrow feather quills "I can't wait to use these fo-" Nami looked down at what was on Robins desk. She blinked a few times, and even rubbed her eyes to make sure she wasn't seeing thing.
"OI PUT ME DOWN!!"
"So that fruit actually works, I'm Gonna Make a forune off of it." Nami smiled while holding zoro in her fist.
"Why do I get the feeling that you two planed this"
"It was mis navigators who volunteered you." Robin smile
"You both just wait once I get back to normal there will be no more women on this ship" Zoro threatened
"You're really in no position to threaten anyone right now." Nami pulled off his boots "Awe there so small, uh and they reek." Nami turned her head in disgust as she dropped them on the desk.
"Ha serves you right for shrinking me."
Nami started to grinned evilly "Oh really, serves me right huh."
Zoro paled at the look she was giving " I take it back."
"Too late, I bought this new scrubbing brush that I wanted to try out be for I used it." She dug through the bag "It's bath time"
"I would love to help miss navigator." Robin grinned. "But first may I see that feather quill."
"Sure Robin-nechan" namie handed her the black one. "How about this." Nami turned Zoro upside down in her Fist so his feet were faceing them."
"Yas this will do" Robin used the very tip of the quil and twirled it.
Zoro tried his best to hold back his luaghter, but failed
"Oh my, swordsman-san what cute feet you have." Robin passed the quill to Namie who was happy to continue the torture.
The girls headed towards the bathroom,wiht a luaghing zoro. Namie held him up to her face, "wow your really ticklish"
"SHU- HEHEHE-SHUT UP!!"
"Oh, poor mini zoro is being tortured' Namie cooed as she stuck the feather in her hair.
Robin filled the sink with water, while Nami stripped zoro of his clothes.
"OI! knock it off, I can bathe myself."
"Sorry, but your not ruining my fun." Nami had to fight for his boxers, but managed to remove those too. She then had him dangling by his foot over the sink.
"What are you doing?" Zoro was panicking, he had his groin covered, but he could tell that the sink wasn't to full. If she dropped from heear he could die.
Nami was to busy measuring the brush.
"thats quit small for a scubbing brush, Namie"
"Its suppose to be ussed for your toe nails or finger nails, its small ebough to work on him." She placed Zoro in the sink head first.
Zoro gasp for breathe he sat up, just as he thought it wasn't that deep it came up to his fore arms.
"Now where to start scrubbing?" Namie had the evil looking face again, and again Zoro paled in horror.

If your breasts were bigger, maybe you'd be as good looking as me." Nami was being sort of a douche, lately, and Robin didn't like it. "I wish I could some how teach that girl a leason..." Robin thought to herself. Later that night, Nami said she wasn't feeling to well, and went to lay down. Robin, being the kind person that she is went to see if she was OK. When she walked into Nami's room, Nami was no where to be found! Robin heard a faint voice calling her name. She felt something on her toe so she looked down, to see a shrunken Nami! Robin picked her up and smiled. "Well, whose breasts are bigger NOW?" Nami was scared out of her wits. "L-l-look! I'm sorry! I didn't mean to hurt your feelings!' Robin looked at her intentally. "Well..."
